categories: Category:Military officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Murtog was a Human male who served as captain of security for the Dark Lord of the Sith, Darth Nyriss. Nyriss was a member of the Dark Council of the reconstituted Sith Empire, and around 3954 BBY, she became entangled in a plot to unseat the Sith Emperor. Four years later, the conspiracy came to a head with the arrival of the Jedi Exile Meetra Surik to the Sith capital world of Dromund Kaas. Another of Nyriss's servants, the Sith Lord Scourge arranged a meeting with Surik, during which Murtog was killed.
